a1: Who is the best German player of all time?
a2: Gerd Muller was the best With 68 goals in 62 games at international level, modern day forwards in Germany will always be likened to ‘The Bomber’.
q3: I wonder if anyone's been compared to being the next "bomber"
a3: Not yet, but someone could emerge soon.
a4: He is a detrimental asset to the team.
q5: Why do you think he is detrimental to the team?
